Winetobe x IOC

Content Creation & Marketing Proposal

We've got a vision.


We want to help you position Wine School as the ultimate destination for wine education and tastings in Bali. We'll help you reflect the incredible experience you offer through your content and social media, and help you attract the right target audience.

WHO WE ARE

Tina May is a marketer and entrepreneur that has helped businesses all over the world attract their ideal client, and boost sales through their websites, social media and digital marketing.

Emilio, also known as Eyes of a Nomad is a content creator from Melbourne Australia currently living the dream in Bali, Indonesia. He helps brands capture the essence of their personality and really tell a story through photography & videography.

Together, we grew Institute of Code from zero to over 500 students in less than 4 years, and now work along side other experts in the field to teach our students how to build thriving careers in social media & content creation.

Our Experience

We've worked with luxury hotels, villas, restaurants and bars around the world, as well as international fashion labels and product based brands. Just to name a few ...

  • Uluwatu Surf Villas

We have the experience and enthusiasm to help you take the Wine School brand to the next level.

Our Pitch

We offer full-service content creation and social media management to help you quickly launch a brand you can be proud of and start attracting customers. We'll provide fast-tracked services to complete everything within 6 weeks.

Summary of services:

  • Brand Development - $1500
  • Website Design & Development - $2850
  • Website & Social Copy Writing - $1200
  • Complete Photography & Videography Package - $2650
  • Launch Promotion - $1700
  • Monthly Social & Blog - $800

Brand Development

We'll help you create a completely new brand for the Wine School in Canggu, one that complements the existing Winetobe brand but is able to grow beyond it and appeal to the target audience here.

Brand Development Includes:

  • Strategic Brand Development
  • 3 Name Concepts
  • Logo Design, Brand Colors & Typography
  • Brand Guidelines Document

Website Design & Development

We'll design and build you a brand new completely custom website, that's blazingly fast and easy to edit and maintain. We'll take into consideration your audience's goals, brand strategy, and modern UX & design trends to craft an online presence that has people begging to sign up for your events.

Website Features:

  • visually stunning design
  • simple, user-friendly navigation
  • SEO (Search Engine Optimised) site for strong rankings for relevant key words
  • fast to load and compatible across all modern browsers
  • easy for non-technical users to update and maintain
  • mobile and tablet friendly (responsive) design
  • built in the latest web technologies (HTML, CSS, Javascript & Jekyll)
  • custom integration of an event booking platform
  • integration of google analytics and facebook tracking pixels


We'll manage everything for you with fast, reliable hosting, backups, security & technical support provided for $85 per month

Website Copywriting

We'll craft compelling copy that's not only optimised for search engines but also for your ideal customer. We understand what it takes to get people excited about unique experiences, and position the value in a way that's impossible to resist.

  • SEO Optimised Website Copywriting - $1200
  • + Writing engaging SEO optimised blog posts - $150 each
  • + Setting up optimised social media / trip advisor profiles - $250 each

Content Creation

We will capture professional photos and short videos to showcase the Wine School experience. This package includes full planning and coordination of each shoot, the photography / videography itself and professional editing to suit your aesthetic.

Content will be shot on a Canon 5D MkIV camera, Mavic 2 Pro Drone, and Crane 2 Stabiliser (for smooth video).

If you decide to use any professional models and/or hair and makeup artists we can organise this for you (additional fees to be paid directly).

  • Half-day photoshoot with 25 high resolution venue + lifestyle photos - $550
  • Event photography & video - 20 photos + 30 second video - $650 each
  • Product shots of specific wines for social media - $150
  • BONUS: 4x short (5 sec) cinematic videos for website banners
  • BONUS: 6x short (5 - 15 sec) cinematic videos for social media
  • BONUS: Behind the scenes stories on @eyesofanomad to 27k followers.

Launch Marketing

We'll help you hit the ground running by helping organise and host an influencer event, from planning the event, writing the copy, inviting influencers, personally hosting the event, and following up with the influencers post-event.

We'll also help you organise 2 monthly paid events with the potential for long-term recurring revenue.

  • Hosting 1x Influencer Launch Event - $1250
  • Organising 2x monthly paid events - $450

Social Media Management

Each month we would take the content we have shot and schedule it all for you in an instagram management tool (we recommend Planoly) creating a beautiful cohesive grid. Then we would draft engaging captions, and add relevant hashtags and location tags.

We'll also write one SEO optimised blog post per month, add relevant photos and upload it to your website.

  • 30 posts per month scheduled to both Facebook & Instagram
  • Creation of a beautifully cohesive grid
  • Writing engaging captions
  • Hashtag research & strategy
  • Scheduled for automatic posting
  • Monthly Social Media Management - $650 per month
  • SEO optimised blog post - $150 each
